remarks: The product of a family of left modules is a left module.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdslmodd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdslmodd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. Ring ) $.
prdslmodd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
prdslmodd.rm $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> LMod ) $.
prdslmodd.rs $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. I ) -> ( Scalar ` ( R ` y ) ) = S ) $.
prdslmodd $p |- ( ph -> Y e. LMod ) $.
$d I y $.
$d R y $.
$d S y $.
$d Y y $.
$d ph y $.
